value.title: Elon Musk said people who don't think AI could be smarter than them are 'way dumber than they think they are'
value.excerpt: "The people I see being the most wrong about AI are the ones who are very smart," Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Wednesday.

value.title: New York bans use of facial recognition in schools statewide
value.excerpt: New York state passed legislation that would ban the use of facial recognition in schools, if signed by Governor Andrew Cuomo.

value.title: Extracting custom entities from documents with Amazon Textract and Amazon Comprehend
value.excerpt: Amazon Textract is a machine learning (ML) service that makes it easy to extract text and data from scanned documents. value.title: Microsoft reports $38 billion in Q4 2020 revenue: Azure up 47%, Surface up 28%, and LinkedIn up 10%
value.excerpt: Microsoft today reported fiscal Q4 2020 earnings, including revenue of $38.0 billion, net income of $11.2 billion, and earnings per share of $1.46.

value.title: RetrieveGAN AI tool combines scene fragments to create new images

value.title: Artificial Intelligence is Now Being Used to Resolve Divorces
value.excerpt: An online app called Amica is now using artificial intelligence to help separating couples make parenting arrangements and divide their assets. For many people, the coronavirus pandemic has put even the strongest of relationships to the test.

value.title: Tencent and Chinese scientists use deep learning to predict fatal COVID-19 cases
value.excerpt: Tech firms around the world are in an overdrive to help battle the coronavirus pandemic. Research showed that 6.5% of COVID-19 patients can suddenly progress to serious illness, and among them the mortality rate can be as high as 49%.
